song.title: A Knight's Tale
song.info:
_Composed By:_ _DreaMSectioN_
_A knights Tale_
Well this is yet another song in the orchestral style. This has the mighty drums of a war song and allso the very emotional Flute and Piano melodies. This is put together in to this tune. The sound is mighty and aswell sothing. A very good relax track if you ask me. I spend many hours on this track. So I hope you enjoy it as much to listen to as I enjoyed making it
If you whan't to tell me something about this or my other songs feel free to contact me! E-Mail: dream_sectionhotmail .com
Greet list! Can't forget that one.
Platinum LoRdLaZeR Awesome Elwood Reptile&Sky Area51_DNA AcidSoule BlackShard RedHeat Projekt-X moky sheepshyfter zerione Micke And many many more! Greetz to yall!!!
_DreaMSectioN_ _Finished: 01 10 22_
